description: very happy plays tonnes of SNES, NES, SEGA and much more
summary: works fantastic with heaps of platform roms

description: It is a little tricky for new ubuntu users to get mednafen installed, but once installed this frontend is great.

Long story short, Mednaffe even told me straight away my bios file was a bad dump, I got a new one and the emulation was FLAWLESS. Little to no setup required, it just works outside the box with perfect sound and graphic emulation. easy to understand interface, except controller setup i had to google, (it's ALT, Shift + 1)

Small rant about the other emulators i tried for PSX games:
PCSXR has a few configuration problems (like setting cpu = 1 in the config or else it crashes and not being able to set up controllers if you have two plugged in at once)
and past that it suffered from some issues like sound emulation being of in some games and others being laggy/stuttering with little you can do to fix it.

Retroarch was a pain in the butt to get anything working. It's interface is one of those "big picture" style ones where you're meant to navigate with the controller. I hate those things. First I had to install the non-snap version so it would recognise other harddrives in the media/username folder, then i had a bunch of problems concerning PSX bios files, (like the bios file filenames being case sensitive..) some people like retroarch but it's got way too many options for my needs and was about an hours worth of googling problems and setup stuff that it wasn't worth it.

So, yeh, TL;DR, Mednaffe is really great.
summary: Better than retroarch, better than PCSXR for psx games

description: Loving this frontend so far. Very intuitive and user friendly.
Exactly what the title says, with the only need really is to configure controls. Works as expected. Was about to lose hope until I found this emulator. Highly RECOMMENDED.
None of the emulators produce any sound output, and there's no documentation to get it properly set up

If you don't have a sound or your get following error:
"Error opening a sound device."

Go to the Global Settings > Sound and change your audio device to:
"sexyal-literal-default" (without quotes)
Lo recomiendo funciona muy bien ,si os sale el problema de long size es por que teneis que poner las bios al emulador un saludo si lees la reseña .
summary: No lo pienses es el mejor emulador

description:
Mednafen es un emulador bastante potente, con la dificultad de no contar una aplicación gráfico, sino que funciona a través de la interfaz de línea de comandos. Mednaffe tiene las diversas opciones para configurar cada sistema que se desee usar de una forma sencilla.

¡Muy recomendable!
Esta interfaz grafica para el Mednafe es de lo mejor. Tiene muchas opciones para personalizar cada Consola de juegos y es compatible con practicamente todo el catalogo de juegos retro. lo Recomiendo!
summary: La mejor Sobre todo para GBA

description:
Es genial volver a jugar a aquellos juegos de hace más de 30 años de una manera tán sencilla. Descargar juego, descomprimir y decirle a Mednaffe dónde se encuentra.
!A JUGAR!
es genial solo que no los puedo maximizar
summary: el mejor emulator te abre los juegos rapidito

description: Desde que lo probé, éste y el MAME son los únicos emuladores que tengo instalados en el PC. Es brutal !!
Meme sur petite config K50IE + Xubuntu 18-04. Merci aux personnes ayant permis a ce soft d'etre disponible pour nos besoins
Faut fouiller pour trouver les parametres mais emule bien et reconnaît mes manettes . Je suis sur Xubuntu 18-04 et MSI GE70. Bon soft
summary: Fonctionne bien sur SNES et GBA GBC

description:
Поддерживает множество старых консолей 90-х годов. Немного поиграл в SMD, управление джойстиком настроить в игре альт+шифт+1. Не понял почему джойстик на три кнопки настраивается, вместо xyz там турбо abc. Меню на английском. Полный экран на Alt+Enter. Сохраниться и загрузиться F5 F7.
Настройки разрешения на полный экран и фильтры найти можно самим в окне интерфейса.
удобные настройки в gui . а если добавить bios , можно и в PS пошпилить.
